member.remarks:
ErrorMessage validation code:
-1: Request or ContextInfo values are null
-2: Required ArticleReference value in all LineList elements
-3: Duplicate IdLine value in LineList elements
-4: Required IdStore value for Location when StoreLocationInfo.StoreIdType is IdStore
-5: Required IdStoreFUC value for Location when StoreLocationInfo.StoreIdType is IdStoreFUC
-6: Location only supports StoreLocationInfo
-7: Required EventLocalDateTime or EventUTCDateTime
-8: Required EventLocalTimeZoneInfoId
member.returns: The process result. This includes the promotions applied
